Create a modern and clean document site for your open source project using Astro and daisyUI

Features:

  • Made with Astro, Markdown, Tailwind CSS and daisyUI

  • Search functionality

  • SEO friendly, Lightweight and fast

  • Dark mode and Light mode

Including:

  • Homepage with features sections, code demo, contributors images, testimonials and installation guide

  • Document pages made from Markdown files with Sidebar, page content links, sponsors section

  • Search bar using Algolia DocSearch

  • Theme switch button with dark theme and light theme (compatible with all daisyUI themes)
Nexus: Dashboard for React and Next

The ultimate dashboard template for React and Next.js

Made with React 18 and daisyUI 4

Available in 3 packages:

  • Starter â€“Single page dashboard for React

  • Standard â€“ Multi page dashboard for React

  • Pro â€“ Multi page dashboard for Next.js


Starter package includes:

  • Single page dashboard homepage


Standard and Pro packages include:

  • Dashboard homepage

  • Landing page

  • 6 ecommerce pages with tables and cards

  • File manager layout

  • Chat layout

  • 4 auth pages including login, register, password reset

  • 19 component page examples with all variants

  • 7 form component examples with all variants

Including:

Headless UI + daisyUI component pack for Vue

Headless UI provides JS functionality, keyboard navigation and accessibility without any design decision.

It's a perfect match with daisyUI to use in your Vue project.
Headless UI + daisyUI component pack for React

Headless UI provides JS functionality, keyboard navigation and accessibility without any design decision.

It's a perfect match with daisyUI to use in your React project.

Professionally designed auth pages to use in your project right away.

Features:

  • 3 HTML pages made with daisyUI 4

  • Framework agnostic. Can be used everywhere

  • Compatible with all 32 daisyUI themes

Including:

  • Login page

  • Signup page

  • Password recovery page

  • Form inputs with HTML validation and validation styles

  • Login with Google button

  • Toggle and Alert examples

Production-ready admin dashboard template to use in your project right now.

Features:

  • HTML admin dashboard layout made with daisyUI 4

  • Web component charts

  • Framework agnostic. Can be used everywhere

  • No dependencies

Including:

  • 2 exclusive daisyUI themes (dark/light) + Compatible with all 32 daisyUI themes

  • Responsive grid layout

  • 14 blocks of useful sections for dashboard

  • Sidebar with collapsible submenus

  • Tables and Item lists

  • Dropdown menus

  • Charts and forms
